src:
沙茶醬燜豆腐 很棒的家常菜（視頻）

02 Nov 2019, 03:53

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月02日訊】沙茶醬燜豆腐
配料：嫩豆腐500克，生抽20克，沙茶醬15克，香蔥適量，澱粉3克，油適量
以下YouTube視頻示範：

text:
Shacha sauce, tofu, great home cooking (video)

02 Nov 2019, 03:53

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing time, November 02, 2019] Shacha sauce and tofu
Ingredients: 500 grams of tender tofu, soy sauce 20 grams, 15 grams of sand tea sauce, appropriate amount of shallots, 3 grams of starch, oil amount
